sourcesContent:
import { TextField, Button, Paper, Typography, Stack } from "@mui/material";
import { Container } from "@mui/system";
import React from "react";
import Header from "../components/header";

export default function Login() {
  const paperStyle = { padding: "40px", width: "28%" };

  return (
    <>
      <Header />
      <Stack
        dir="rtl"
        direction="row"
        spacing={5}
        sx={{
          minHeight: "650px",
          height: "100vh",
          mt: "-64px",
          justifyContent: "center",
          alignItems: "center",
          "& .MuiTextField-root": {
            paddingBottom: "10px",
            fontSize: "10px",
          },
          "& .MuiButton-root": { fontSize: "12px", px: 4, py: 1.5 },
        }}
      >
        <Paper sx={paperStyle} elevation={7}>
          <Typography sx={{ color: "#000", mb: "30%" }} variant="h1">
            ورود به حساب کاربری
          </Typography>
          <form>
            <TextField fullWidth label="نام کاربری" variant="outlined" />
            <TextField fullWidth label="رمز عبور" variant="outlined" />
          </form>
          <Button
            sx={{ mt: 10 }}
            type="submit"
            variant="contained"
            color="primary"
            size="large"
          >
            ورود
          </Button>
        </Paper>
        <Paper sx={paperStyle} elevation={7}>
          <Typography sx={{ color: "#000", mb: "30%" }} variant="h1">
            ساخت حساب کاربری
          </Typography>
          <form>
            <TextField fullWidth label="نام کاربری" variant="outlined" />
            <TextField fullWidth label="ایمیل" variant="outlined" />
            <TextField fullWidth label="رمز عبور" variant="outlined" />
          </form>
          <Button
            sx={{ mt: 3 }}
            type="submit"
            variant="contained"
            color="secondary"
            size="large"
          >
            عضویت
          </Button>
        </Paper>
      </Stack>
    </>
  );
}
